articles.title: Biden to deliver prime-time address on democracy Thursday
articles.description: The president returns Thursday to Philadelphia to talk about the « battle for the soul of the nation » in this year's midterm elections.

articles.author: Rachel Ramirez, CNN
articles.title: Greenland ice losses set to raise global sea levels by nearly a foot, new research shows
articles.description: Widespread ice losses from Greenland have locked in nearly a foot of global sea level rise in the near future -- and new research suggests there is no way to stop it, even if the world stopped releasing planet-heating emissions today.
articles.content: (CNN)Widespread ice losses from Greenland have locked in nearly a foot of global sea level rise that's set to come in the near future -- and new research suggests there is no way to stop it, even if … [+4011 chars]

articles.author: Henry Olsen
articles.title: Why the Artemis moon launch delay is a national-security worry
articles.description: China and Russia have their eyes on the moon. too. Our most dangerous adversaries could be in a position to harm U.S. interests in space sooner than we had thought.
articles.content:
Comment on this story

articles.title: California Senate Passes Bill to Regulate Fast-Food Industry
